name: Fashion Forms Nu Ultralite Bra
description:
NuBra ultralite bra by Fashion Forms.
  • Lightweight soft-touch fabric
  • Moulded foam bra with inner adhesive cups
  • Low centre front to enhance the cleavage
  • Can be reused when worn according to instructions
  • We recommend that you perform a skin test 24 hours before wear
  • Do not wear for more than 4-6 hours at a time
  • Hand wash
  • 40% Silicone, 30% Polyester, 30% Polyurethane
  • Our model wears a 32C
additionalInfo:
Fabric 1: 40% Silicone, 30% Polyester, 30% Polyurethane.

Please Note: This product is non-returnable without the protective film.

brand.name: Fashion Forms
brand.description: Fashion Forms looks to creativity and innovation with a collection of enhancing bras and accessories. Multi-way bras and plunging strapless styles provide invisible solutions underneath clothing, as Fashion Forms add to a range of cleavage boosting silicone pads and fail-safe fashion tape.
